alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 3:52AM CST until March 02 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CST FOR CENTRAL CALDWELL...SOUTHERN HAYS...NORTH CENTRAL GUADALUPE...WEST CENTRAL BASTROP AND NORTHEASTERN COMAL COUNTIES... At 352 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over San Marcos, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Wimberley, Canyon Lake, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Staples, Mountain City, Maxwell, Reedville, Redwood, Lytton Springs, Taylorsville, Hunter and San Marcos Regional Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
